description.raw:
@jlee02 has integrated Coulomb joint friction into DART as of [version 4.3.3](https://github.com/dartsim/dart/releases/tag/v4.3.3). This pull request repeats the refactoring of `DARTJoint::[GS]etParam` that has already been done for the other physics engines and enables the joint friction test for DART. It also fixes compiler warnings by modifying `dart_inc.h`.

Note that there is a bug in DART's implementation, such that Coulomb joint friction interferes with the joint limit constraints. This is captured in [an upstream issue](https://github.com/dartsim/dart/issues/317).

I have triggered a [dart jenkins job](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any_dart4-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/) and will post the results when it finishes.

Thanks @jlee02 !
